page.title: 04TRANSPORT
page.content: The buses in our area are single deckers painted green and run by Provincial. There are two major bus routes through our area. Their route is Fareham to Gosport. The buses run from Alverstoke to Gosport Town, so that people can get on ferries and buses to other destinations. The buses are used mainly by old peple and schoolchildren. There are quite a lot of ferries that travel through our area. The Townsend Thoreson and Brittany ferries to France and Sealink goes to the Isle of Wight and to the Channel Islands. From near Clarence Pier at Southsea the Hovercraft makes regular crossings throughout the year to Ryde on the Isle of Wight.
